lot_description:
The complete book, comprising four lithographs, one printed in colors, 1961, from the edition of unknown size, with text by Jaime Sabartés, on wove paper, bound (as issued), printed by Mourlot, Paris, published by George Braziller, New York, contained in the original cloth-covered boards and dust jacket
10 x 12 7/8 x 1 in.; 25.5 x 32.8 x 2.5 cm

Terre de faïence plaque, painted in colors and partially glazed, 1968, numbered 35/100, inscribed 'J. 126 B', with the Empreinte Originale de Picasso and Madoura stamps, framed
8 5/8 x 8 5/8 in.; 21.8 x 21.8 cm

Terre de faïence plaque, painted in colors and partially glazed, 1956, numbered 90/250, inscribed 'K. 120', 'Edition Picasso' and 'Madoura', framed
7 7/8 x 7 7/8 in.; 20 x 20 cm

Terre de faïence plaque, painted in colors and partially glazed, 1956, numbered 100/300, inscribed 'K. 121', 'Edition Picasso' and 'Madoura', framed
7 7/8 x 7 7/8 in.; 20.1 x 20.1 cm

Terre de faïence plate, painted in colors and partially glazed, 1956, numbered 25/100, with the Empreinte Originale de Picasso and Madoura stamps
16 7/8 in.; 42.8 cm

Terre de faïence plate, 1965, numbered 16/100, inscribed 'T120', with the Empreinte Originale de Picasso and Madoura stamps
10 1/2 in.; 26.8 cm

Terre de faïence plate, partially painted, 1950, numbered 58/250, incised 'N. 108', 'Edition Picasso' and 'Madoura', with the Edition Picasso and Madoura stamps
15 3/8 in.; 39 cm
